segments.text: I can't believe the mess I'm seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting to see the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are making things worse by taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, risking a fall and making the kitchen even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of revulsion at the thought of the slippery, wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, adding to the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the sight of this messy, chaotic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a complete disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
